Articles.Content:
I've installed Firespitter on Mac OS X by simply moving the 'Firespitter' folder into Gamedata. It's broken as hell, there's no engine sound, the propellers seems to spin constantly and NOTHING works, such as gears or anything that moves. The installation instructions say:

Q: I have no engine sounds, but the propellers spin

A: You placed the folder in the wrong place or renamed it.

Q: The propellers don't spin, but they provide thrust

A: You somehow installed without the dll file, so only stock code is running.

I did none of these yet I still have problems. What have I done wrong?

Try reading the thread Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the Firespitter pack hasn't been updated since KSP 0.24, so it won't work as is with 0.90. You can download an updated plugin from Snjo's GitHub (link in the Firespitter OP) and replace the one from the pack.

Hi,

I think its updated for KSP v25 but ya doesnt work in v90; I kept some models though ! Some things do work !

Zeta
